22unsigned hash(const char *s, int len)
23{
24#if 0
25 unsigned h = 0, g;
26 while (*s != '\0') {
27 h <<= 4;
28 h += *s++;
29 if ((g = h & 0xf0000000) != 0) {
30 h ^= g >> 24;
31 h ^= g;
32 }
33 }
34#endif
35 unsigned h = 0;
36 while (--len >= 0)
37 h = *s++ + 65587*h;
38 return h;
39}
